text: The Deep Purple is a 1920 American crime drama movie directed by Raoul Walsh and is the second adaption of the 1910 play of Wilson Mizner. It stars Miriam Cooper, Helen Ware, Vincent Serrano, William B. Mack, Lincoln Plumer and was distributed by Realart Pictures Corporation. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:1920s crime drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh
title: The Deep Purple (1920 movie)
